TetraCSGModel Class Reference

TetraCSGModel class represents complete CSG model. When you are reading or writing a CSG model from a file, you actually treat it as a single model, while actually the model is formed from simple primitives. This class handles all such issues as reading/writing a CSG model from a file. More...

Detailed Description

TetraCSGModel class represents complete CSG model. When you are reading or writing a CSG model from a file, you actually treat it as a single model, while actually the model is formed from simple primitives. This class handles all such issues as reading/writing a CSG model from a file.

Getter function for the tree object

Returns:
Returns a pointer to the tree object.
Warning:
Don't free or delete the object, else the software will segfault

bool TetraCSGModel::IsLoaded (   )  [inline]
 

Function to check whether a model is loaded into this CSGModel object or not

Returns:
Returns a boolean value signifying whether a model is loaded or not

bool TetraCSGModel::OpenFromFile (  const char *  fname  ) 
 

Loads CSG model from a file

Parameters:
fname Name of the file, from which CSG model data is to be read. It is an error to pass NULL to this function
Returns:
Returns a boolean value. If true, it means model is successfully loaded.

void TetraCSGModel::Render (   ) 
 

Renders the model by constructing triangles from the model data. The construction of triangles and clipping is done by CSGObject

See also:
CSGObject

bool TetraCSGModel::SaveToFile (  const char *  fname  ) 
 

Saves the CSG model into a file

Parameters:
fname Name of the file to which the CSG model is to be written. It will not confirm whether to overwrite a file or not.
Returns:
Success or failure is returned as a boolean value. True means success.

void TetraCSGModel::SetTree (  TetraCSGTree *  tree  )  [inline]
 

Setter function for the tree object

Parameters:
tree New model tree on which this model should operate on.
Warning:
Don't set NULL or any illegal value it will segfault the application. Value passed will not be checked
